body.name: Phone Tripod, Arsoer 67" Adjustable Height Tripod with Horizontal Column and Removable Clip Mount for Overhead Shot, 360° Rotation Tripod Stand with Wireless Remote/Carry Bag for Camera/iPhone/Webcam
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 3 mins
features: 2.【Horizontal Column & Overhead Shooting】: The Arsoer tripod features a horizontal column that can be rotated 360°horizontally, allowing you to reach those hard-to-get spots. Whether you're shooting overhead videos, live streaming, or even cooking videos, this tripod has got you covered. The adjustable boom ensures that you can get the perfect angle every time.

1.【Adjustable and Stable】: The Arsoer 67" Phone Tripod offers adjustable height, stable legs, allowing you to capture stunning horizontal and vertical shots with ease. The four-section column legs are equipped with three quick flick locks, enabling swift and effortless adjustments to the working height. Its lightweight design and included carry bag make it ideal for on-the-go creatives. The tripod's adjustable height (18.5" to 67") ensures that you can capture the perfect shot from any angle.

3.【Versatile Compatibility】: With three 1/4 standard screws, this tripod supports simultaneous attachment of devices like a phone holder, GoPro, ring light, or cameras such as Canon, Nikon, Sony, Ricoh, Olympus, and Fujifilm. The adjustable phone holder fits devices with widths from 2.2 to 4 inches, compatible with iPhone 15 Pro Max, 14, 13, and Galaxy Note 9/8. The 360° rotating ball head allows seamless panorama shooting.

4.【Compact and Portable】: Weighing just 2.2 pounds and coming with a convenient carry bag, this phone tripod is lightweight and portable. Take it with you wherever you go and capture stunning images and videos on the fly. The tripod's 18.7” storage height design makes it easy to store and carry, saving you valuable space. We also offer a Bluetooth remote that is compatible with Android and iOS, making remote control of devices up to 33 feet/10m effortless.

5.【Package List & After-Sales Service】: The package includes: 1*Tripod Stand, 1*Wireless Remote Control, 1*Phone Holder, 1*Removable Clip Mount, 1*Ball Head, and 1*Carry Bag. Your satisfaction is our top priority. The Arsoer tripod comes with 24 months of after-sales service, ensuring that you can enjoy your purchase with peace of mind. For questions, our friendly customer service is ready to assist. Get the Arsoer tripod and take your phone photography to new heights.【 In addition, THE HORIZONTAL COLUMN is hidden in the central tube and can be used by loosen the knob and pulling it out！！！ If you can't find the horizontal column, please contact our customer service.！！！】

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ball Head With a 360-degree rotation capability, you can capture photos both horizontally and vertically. 1/4“ Standard Screw Using three 1/4" standard screws enables the simultaneous fixation of three devices. Removable Clap Mount Capable of movement and detachment, ensure you adjust to your preferred angle before securing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It has been so hard to find a sturdy, affordable tripod that can do clean overhead shots, and this is perfection! I use it for social media videos of recipes, but it would also be great for flatlay photos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal & functionality
reviews.reviewText: What's so many devices and constant needs? This tripod really did help. I love that you can angle with the bar to show what you are doing. Conversationally or for videos and sharing for learning purposes. This was definitely a game changer, and it was extremely easy to set up. Everything is wonderfully adjustable for tabletop or tall freestanding. Sturdy. Came with all the needed attachments. Very happy with this especially being a good deal cost wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is such great quality! I was struggling so much with the weight of my phone, the other brands couldn’t hold my phone if I wanted to record horizontally. This is a life saver! Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Im using this for my phone and it fits perfectly. Nice inexpensive yet high quality tripod. Very lightweight and comes with a carrying bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 13 yr old thinks this is a game changer and hell be youtube famous in no time! Was a pretty easy to set up and hes recording like a pro.
